item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I am a Staff Research Scientist at Google Research, working in computer vision and machine learning. Most recently, I focus on developing on-device techniques for mobile products, such as Google’s first Face Unlock on Pixel 4 (2019). Prior to Google, I was a Deep Learning Scientist at Apple, taking a major role of algorithm development for on-device technology, including Apple’s first Face ID shipped with iPhone X (2017), real-time camera features (2018) shipped with decedent devices (eg, XR, XS, XS Max) and next-gen products.

item.title: Interns / Students
item.description: Jason Chong (UIUC/David Froysth), 2020 “Retrieve in Style: Unsupervised Facial Feature Transfer and Retrieval” Project Paper Code Shlok Mishra (UMD/David Jacobs), 2020 “Improved Detection of Face Presentation Attacks Using Image Decomposition” Paper Esther Robb (Virginia Tech/Jia-Bin Huang), 2019 “Few-Shot Adaptation of Generative Adversarial Networks” Project Paper Code Tweets Jaymo Kang (UC Berkeley), 2018 “Image Domain Transfer using Unpaired Image-to-Image Translation”

item.title: Services
item.description: Area Chair ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2020 ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2019 IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2018 Organizing Committee ICMI 2021 (Sponsorship Chair) Conference Review Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2014–present International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015–present European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2012–present Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2015–present Asian Conference on Compute Vision (ACCV), 2012–2014 AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2016–present Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), 2019–present International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2018–present Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII), 2015 Journal Review
